about_the_game:
Start your engines! Purchase the KTM Pack and experience real off-road riding!

This pack includes the following vehicles:

  • 2023/2024 KTM 125 SX MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 250 SX MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 250 SX-F MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 450 SX-F MX
  • 2009 KTM 250 SX ATV
detailed_description:
Start your engines! Purchase the KTM Pack and experience real off-road riding!

This pack includes the following vehicles:

  • 2023/2024 KTM 125 SX MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 250 SX MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 250 SX-F MX
  • 2023/2024 KTM 450 SX-F MX
  • 2009 KTM 250 SX ATV
